author: Lindsay Kramer | lkramer@syracuse.com
title: Syracuse Crunch vs. Binghamton Senators: Live updates from home opener
text:
Syracuse.com's Lindsay Kramer will provide live updates from today's game between the Syracuse Crunch and the Binghamton Senators. The puck drops at 7 p.m. at the Oncenter War Memorial.
See the updates below in the comments section.
REFRESH THIS PAGE if you're having trouble seeing the live updates.
